OpenIDCredRefreshing.Title: Refreshing credentials
OpenIDCredRefreshing.Message: Your OpenID credentials are being refreshed in the background.

Error.Message1024: There was a problem while accepting the credential offer.
Error.Message1025: There was a problem while rejecting the credential offer
Error.Message1026: There was a problem while updating retrieved credentials.
Error.Message1027: There was a problem while accepting the proof request.
Error.Message1028: There was a problem while rejecting the proof request
Error.Title1029: Details unable to update retrieved credentials.
Error.Message1029: There was a problem while updating retrieved credentials.
Error.Message1030: There was a problem while accepting the connection redirection.
Error.Message1031: There was a problem while accepting the connection.
Error.Message1032: There was a problem while removing the credential.
Error.Message1034: Proof request could not be found.
Error.Message1035: Credential offer could not be found.
Error.Message1036: Wallet credentials could not be found
Error.Message1037: There was a problem while removing the Contact.
Error.Title1038: Unable to generate a proof request.
Error.Message1038: There was a problem while generating a proof request.
Error.Message1039: There was a problem while handling a deeplink.
Error.Message1040: There was a problem while creating the PIN.
Error.Message1041: There was a problem while unlocking with PIN.
Error.Message1042: There was a problem while verifying the PIN.
Error.Title1043: Unable to retrieve credentials for proof.
Error.Message1043: There was a problem while retrieving credentials for the proof.
Error.Message1044: There was a problem while initializing onboarding.
Error.Message1045: There was a problem while initializing agent.
Error.Message1046: There was a problem while fetching contacts.
Error.Message1047: There was a problem parsing credential card.
Error.Message1048: There was a problem with the proof request.
Error.Message1049: There was a problem while attempting to change your PIN.

GenericError.Title: Something went wrong
GenericError.Message: There was an unexpected error, please try again later.

Terms.Attestation: I have read, understand and accept the terms and conditions.
Terms.Title: Terms And Conditions
Terms.Intro: Please agree to the terms and conditions below before using this application.
Terms.BodyIntro: These terms and conditions (Terms) govern your use of the DigiCred Mobile Wallet ("App"), developed by DigiCred Holdings Inc. ("Developer"). By downloading, installing, or using the App, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, do not use this App.
Terms.DefinitionsBody: "User" refers to any person who downloads, installs, or uses the App. "Content" refers to any text, images, or other media through the App.
Terms.LicenseBody: Subject to your compliance with these Terms, the Developer Grants you a limited non-exclusive, non-transferrable, revocable license to download, install, and use the App for your personal, non-commercial purposes.
Terms.PrivacyBody: Your privacy is important to us. Our Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use the App.
Terms.DisclaimerBody: The App is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. The Developer disclaims all warranties, express or implied, including but not limited to implied warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose.

Tour.WouldYouLike: Would you like some guidance on how to use Aries Bifold?
Tour.AddAndShareDescription: To add and use credentials you scan a QR code displayed by the service provider.
Tour.AddCredentialsDescription: Add credentials by scanning a QR code displayed on the issuer service.
Tour.NotificationsDescription: After you scan a QR code, the credential offer or proof request will appear here, as well as other notable events.
Tour.YourCredentialsDescription: Your added digital credentials appear here. You can review credential details and add and delete credentials.
Tour.CredentialOffersDescription: An organization has offered you a credential. Review the credentials details and choose to accept or decline it. Accepted credentials will be added to your wallet.
Tour.ProofRequestsDescription: An organization is asking you to prove your credentials. Review what they're asking for and choose to accept or decline it.

CameraDisclosure.CameraDisclosure: The camera is used to scan QR codes that initiate a credential offer or credential request. No information about the images is stored, used for analytics, or shared.
CameraDisclosure.ToContinueUsing: To continue using the Aries Bifold scan feature, please allow camera permissions.

Explainer.PINReminder: On the following screen you will be asked to set up a strong personal identification number (PIN).

WhyNeedPin.Paragraph: Your PIN is an important security feature:
WhyNeedPin.ParagraphList1: You can use your PIN instead of biometrics to open your wallet
WhyNeedPin.ParagraphList2: Or use your biometrics to open your wallet, and if your biometrics change change on your device you will need to use the PIN to authenticate your wallet

InfoBox.title: Remember your PIN
InfoBox.message: Make sure you remember your PIN. If you forget it you will need to setup the wallet again and re-add your cards.

Message.CrossPatternValidation: A pattern of cross was detected in your PIN. Please try again.
Message.OddOrEvenSequenceValidation: An odd or even sequence was detected in your PIN. Please try again.
Message.NoRepetitionOfTheSameNumbersValidation: The PIN can't have a repetition of the same digit. Please try again.
Message.MaxAdjacentNumberRepetitionValidation: Adjacent numbers repeating times are more than allowed. Please try again.
Message.NoRepetitionOfTheTwoSameNumbersValidatio: A repeated two-digit sequence was detected in your PIN. Please try again.
Message.NoSeriesOfNumbersValidation: A series was detected in your PIN. Please try again.
Message.PINOnlyContainDigitsValidation: Your PIN needs to only contain digits. Please try again.
Message.PINTooShortValidation: Your PIN is too short. Please try again.
Message.PINTooLongValidation: Your PIN is too long. Please try again.
Message.PINExpectedLengthValidation: Your PIN must be {{num}} digits. Please try again.
Message.OldPINIncorrect: Your old pin is incorrect. Please try again.
Message.PINCommonlyUsed: Your PIN uses a commonly used pattern. Please try again.

Helper.CrossPatternValidation: Does not contain a pattern of cross.
Helper.OddOrEvenSequenceValidation: Does not contain an odd or even sequence.
Helper.NoRepetitionOfTheSameNumbersValidation: Does not contain the same repeating number.
Helper.MaxAdjacentNumberRepetitionValidation: Adjacent numbers repeating times are limited.
Helper.NoRepetitionOfTheTwoSameNumbersValidatio: Does not contain repeating two-digit sequence.
Helper.NoSeriesOfNumbersValidation: Does not contain a series of numbers (123).
Helper.PINTooShortValidation: Your PIN must be more than {{num}} digits.
Helper.PINTooLongValidation: Your PIN must be less than {{num}} digits.
Helper.PINCommonlyUsed: Your PIN uses a commonly used pattern. Please try again.

PINCreate.RememberPIN: Create a PIN to secure your wallet.
PINCreate.PINDisclaimer: If you forget it, you may need to set up your wallet again and re-add your cards.
PINCreate.CardTitle: Create a PIN To Secure Your Wallet
PINCreate.CardSubtitle: If you forget it, you may need to set up your wallet again and re-add your cards.

PINCreateConfirm.PINInputLabel: Re-enter your PIN to confirm it

PINChange.PinChangeSuccessMessage: Your PIN was successsfully changed. You can now log in with your new PIN.
PINChange.RememberChangePIN: Change your PIN to secure your wallet.

InfoBox.Title: Your PIN has been changed
InfoBox.Description: You can now log-in with your new PIN

PINEnter.Title: Welcome back
PINEnter.EnterPIN: Enter your wallet PIN to sign-in
PINEnter.IncorrectPINTries: Incorrect PIN: {{tries}} tries before your app is temporarily locked
PINEnter.LastTryBeforeTimeout: Incorrect PIN: Last try before timeout
PINEnter.EnableBiometrics: You have to enable biometrics to be able to load the wallet.
PINEnter.BiometricsNotProvided: Biometrics not provided, you may use PIN to load the wallet.
PINEnter.LockedOut: You were locked out after {{ time }} minute(s) of inactivity.
PINEnter.BiometricsChanged: Biometrics unlock has been disabled because your device biometrics changed.
PINEnter.AttemptLockoutWarning: Note: for your security, entering another incorrect PIN will temporarily lock the wallet.
PINEnter.AppSettingChangedEnterPIN: Please confirm your change by entering your wallet PIN.
PINEnter.ChangeBiometricsSubtext: Please enter your PIN to confirm a change in biometrics
PINEnter.ForgotPINModalDescription: Forgot your PIN? You'll need to reinstall and setup your wallet again.
PINEnter.EnterPINDescription: Enter your 6 digit PIN to unlock your wallet

AttemptLockout.Title: Your wallet is temporarily locked
AttemptLockout.Description: You have had too many unsuccessful PIN attempts.
AttemptLockout.ForgotPINDescription: For security purposes, you're unable to recover or reset your PIN. You will need to reinstall your wallet and add your credentials again.

Biometry.EnabledText1: Unlock the wallet with your phone's biometrics instead of your wallet PIN.
Biometry.EnabledText2: Using biometrics means that all fingerprints or face ID added on this phone will have access to your wallet.
Biometry.NotEnabledText1: Biometrics is not currently setup on this device and therefore cannot be enabled.
Biometry.NotEnabledText2: If you wish to enable this feature turn biometrics on in the device settings and then return to this screen.
Biometry.Warning: Ensure only you have access to your wallet.
Biometry.UnlockPromptDescription: Use biometrics to unlock your wallet
Biometry.AllowBiometricsDesc: To unlock BC Wallet with your biometrics, please allow biometrics use within your device's settings.
Biometry.SetupBiometricsDesc: To unlock BC Wallet with your biometrics, please set up your biometrics in your device's settings.
Biometry.Title: Biometrics
Biometry.Description: The DigiCred wallet defaults to using your biometrics (face recognition or fingerprint) to unlock the application. We use a PIN as a backup if your biometrics are not working. You can use this control to turn off the biometric unlock.
Biometry.NotAvailableMessage: Biometrics are not available on this device. Please enable them in your device settings.

ActivityHistory.Title: Manage activity history
ActivityHistory.Description: Set how long you want to keep your activity history before it is deleted from your device (it is not stored anywhere else).

WarningDisclaimerAlert.Title: Past activity will be deleted
WarningDisclaimerAlert.Description: Any activity before the period you've just selected will be deleted as soon as you save.

ActivityHistory.StoppedLoggingAlert: You are not logging your activity history.

DeleteActivityHistory.Title: Delete activity history
DeleteActivityHistory.Description: Individual history can be deleted in the history tab or you can delete all activity history. This action cannot be undone.

StopActivityHistoryScreen.Title: Are you sure you want to turn off history?
StopActivityHistoryScreen.Description: No further activity history will be kept in the Ontario Wallet. All previous history will remain.

StopActivityHistoryScreenConfirmed.Title: History turned off
StopActivityHistoryScreenConfirmed.Description: The Ontario Wallet is no longer storing your activity history

DeleteActivityHistoryScreen.Title: Are you sure you want to delete all history?
DeleteActivityHistoryScreen.Description: You will not be able to get your activity history back after you delete it.

DeleteActivityHistoryScreenConfirmed.Title: All history activity deleted
DeleteActivityHistoryScreenConfirmed.Description: The Ontario Wallet deleted all your activity history.

Initial.Title: Do you want to log your wallet activity?

Description.Header: This History section can list when:
Description.PointA: You have shared information with a verifier
Description.PointAAxs: You have shared information with a verifier
Description.PointB: A card is accepted, revoked or expired
Description.PointBAxs: A card is accepted, revoked or expired
Description.Footer: Your wallet activity will only be stored on your device, and you can choose how often it is automatically deleted.
Description.FooterAxs: Your wallet activity will only be stored on your device, and you can choose how often it is automatically deleted.

Button.DoNotLogWalletActivity: Do not log any wallet activity

History.NoHistory: You haven't used any cards yet. Each time you add or use a card, that activity will be saved here.

Contacts.PeopleAndOrganizations: People and organizations you've interacted with are listed here.

ContactDetails.RemoveCaption: To add credentials, the issuing organization needs to be a Contact.
ContactDetails.UnableToRemoveCaption: Unable to remove because there are credentials issued by this Contact in your wallet. Remove the credentials first then remove this Contact.
ContactDetails.RemoveContactMessageWarning: Removing this Contact will delete all existing messages and notifications from them.
ContactDetails.RemoveContactMessageTop: Without this contact, you'll no longer be able to:
ContactDetails.RemoveContactMessageBottom: They won't be notified that you removed them from your contacts.
ContactDetails.RemoveContactsBulletPoint2: Be notified of updates to your credentials
ContactDetails.NoCredentials: You don't have any credentials from this contact.

WhatAreContacts.Title: What are Contacts?
WhatAreContacts.Preamble: Contacts are people or organizations you've interacted with. You're connected over a secure and private line that no one but you or them can see. Nothing is shared without your permission. You can:
WhatAreContacts.ListItemNotifiedOfUpdates: Get notified of updates to your credentials issued by them
WhatAreContacts.ListItemRequest: Request for information from your Contact or they request information from you
WhatAreContacts.RemoveContacts: You can always remove Contacts at any time from your

Credentials.EmptyList: Your wallet is empty. Your accepted credentials will be added here.
Credentials.RemoveCredentialMessage: Are you sure you wish to remove this credential? This action cannot be undone.

PushNotifications.EnableNotifications: Enable Notifications to get instant alerts
PushNotifications.NotificationsOffMessage: Be notified when you receive new credential offers, proof requests, updates to your credentials, new messages and more.
PushNotifications.NotificationsOffTitle: Notifications for Bifold are turned off
PushNotifications.Title: Use Push Notifications
PushNotifications.Subtitle: Be notified when you receive:

CredentialDetails.CredentialRevokedMessageBody: This credential may no longer work for some proof requests. You will need to update the credential with the issuer.
CredentialDetails.RemoveCaption: You will lose your ability to prove the information on this credential with this Wallet.
CredentialDetails.YouWillNotLoseListItem1: Your credential within the system that issued you your credential.
CredentialDetails.YouWillNotLoseListItem2: The issuing organization as a Contact.
CredentialDetails.HowToGetThisCredentialBack: How to get this credential back
CredentialDetails.HowToGetThisCredentialBackListItem1: You will have to go to the organization that issued you this credential and request it again.
CredentialDetails.NavigateToIssuerDetailsHint: Tap to navigate to issuer details
CredentialDetails.RemoveCredentialConfirm: Are you sure you wish to remove this credential? This action cannot be undone.

Home.NoCredentialsMessage: Scan a QR code to receive your first credential
Home.ScanOfferAddCard: Scan an offer to add a card to your wallet

Scan.InvalidQrCode: Invalid QR code. Please try again.
Scan.WillScanAutomatically: A valid QR code will scan automatically.
Scan.WhatToScan: What QR Codes can be scanned?
Scan.ScanOnySpecial: Only special QR codes can be scanned by Bifold Wallet.
Scan.ScanOnlySpecial2: These are presented by participating services or people to receive a credential offer, request for information or to connect.
Scan.ScanOnlySpecial3: Bifold Wallet currently doesn't support adding digital credential by scanning or taking photos of physical ones.
Scan.WhereToUseLink: See where you can use Bifold Wallet
Scan.BadQRCodeDescription: Ths QR code scanned doesn't work with Bifold Wallet. Bifold Wallet only works with participating services. It currently can't add digital credentials by taking photos of physical ones.

PasteUrl.PasteUrlDescription: Paste a URL below to receive a proof request, add a credential or add a Contact.
PasteUrl.ErrorTextboxEmptyDescription: Please add a URL intended for digital wallets and try again.
PasteUrl.ErrorInvalidUrlDescription: Check if the URL is intended for digital wallets and if it was copied correctly, then try again.

Connection.JustAMoment: Just a moment while we make a secure connection...
Connection.TakingTooLong: This is taking longer than usual. You can return to home or continue waiting.
Connection.ScanQR: Show this QR code to the other person
Connection.ScanQRComment: After the QR code is scanned, a connection will be created.
Connection.ShareQR: Sharing this QR code with someone will add them as a Contact.

LoadingPlaceholder.SlowLoadingBody: Check your internet connection and try again.
LoadingPlaceholder.YourRequest: You'll be requested to share the following information.

ConnectionAlert.NotificationBodyLower: in your Contacts. Manage your Contacts in Settings
ConnectionAlert.PopupIntro: Adding organizations as a Contact will allow you to:
ConnectionAlert.PopupPoint1: Get updates to credentials issued by this organization
ConnectionAlert.SettingsInstruction: You can always remove Contacts at anytime in
ConnectionAlert.PrivacyMessage: Use of your credentials is never shared with your Contacts.

CredentialOffer.ThisIsTakingLongerThanExpected: This is taking Longer than expected. Check back later for your new credential.
CredentialOffer.CredentialOnTheWay: Your credential is on the way
CredentialOffer.ConfirmDeclinedTitle: Are you sure you want to decline this credential?
CredentialOffer.ConfirmDeclinedMessage: In order to receive the credential offer again, you will need to reapply with the issuer.
CredentialOffer.DeclineParagraph1: In order to receive the credential offer again, you will need to restart the issuing process again with the issuing service.
CredentialOffer.DeclineParagraph1WithIssuerName: If you change your mind you will need to request the card from {{ issuer }} again.
CredentialOffer.DeclineParagraph2: Are you sure you want to decline this credential offer?
CredentialOffer.CustomOfferParagraph1: Deleting this offer will remove the notification from your list.
CredentialOffer.CustomOfferParagraph2: Don't recongize the organization? Check your Contact list. you only recieve notifications from Contacts you've initiated.
CredentialOffer.DeleteOfferMessage: Deleting this offer will remove the notification from your list.
CredentialOffer.DeleteOfferDescription: Don't recognize the organization? Check your Contacts list. You only receive notifications from Contacts you've initiated

ProofRequest.JustAMoment: Just a moment while we prepare things for you...
ProofRequest.PredicateGe: is greater than or equal to
ProofRequest.PredicateLe: is less than or equal to
ProofRequest.MultipleCredentials: You have multiple credentials to choose from:
ProofRequest.SensitiveInformation: This request is asking for sensitive information.
ProofRequest.RequestedCredentialsCouldNotBeFound: Requested credentials could not be found
ProofRequest.IsRequestingSomethingYouDontHaveAvailabl: is requesting something you don't have available
ProofRequest.YouDoNotHaveDataPredicate: You do not meet the requirements of this proof request from
ProofRequest.IsRequestingYouToShare: is requesting the following information from
ProofRequest.ConfirmDeclinedTitle: Are you sure you want to decline this proof request?
ProofRequest.ConfirmDeclinedMessage: In order to receive the proof request again, the requestor will need to resend it.
ProofRequest.ReviewSentInformation: You shared the following information from {{count}} credentials with
ProofRequest.ReviewSentInformation_one: You shared the following information from {{count}} credential with
ProofRequest.ReviewSentInformation_other: You shared the following information from {{count}} credentials with
ProofRequest.ShareFollowingInformation: is sharing the following information from {{count}} credentials.
ProofRequest.ShareFollowingInformation_one: is sharing the following information from {{count}} credential.
ProofRequest.ShareFollowingInformation_other: is sharing the following information from {{count}} credentials.
ProofRequest.DeclineBulletPoint1: Organizations and services require that you prove you're eligible to continue with their service or access.
ProofRequest.DeclineBulletPoint2: In order to receive the proof request again, you will need to restart the process with the service.
ProofRequest.DeclineBulletPoint3: Are you sure you want to decline this proof request?
ProofRequest.YouCantRespond: You can't respond to this proof request.
ProofRequest.CredentialNotInWallet: This credential is not present in your wallet.
ProofRequest.ProofRequestStateError: The proof request received is in: {{state}}, decline this proof and try again.
ProofRequest.ProofRequestErrorMessage: Something went wrong with the proof request.
ProofRequest.SomeAttributesMissingTitle: The following attributes could not be found:
ProofRequest.MissingAttributesWillBeEmpty: These will be sent as empty values if you proceed.

InfoBox.Title: You do not have a card for this request
InfoBox.Subtitle: Check with {{verifierName}} for accepted cards.

Settings.ChangeMediatorDescription: Changing the mediator will restart the app. Do you want to continue?

ExportWallet.Content_1: Both devices must be on the same WiFi network
ExportWallet.Content_2: Scan the QR code from your old device to begin the transfer
ExportWallet.Content_3: Once complete, your wallet will be
ExportWallet.Content_6: Scan this QR code from your new device
ExportWallet.Content_7: Your wallet has been transferred. You can now delete it from this device.
ExportWallet.TransferIntro: Transfer your wallet to a new device
ExportWallet.TransferDescription: Follow these steps to securely transfer your wallet credentials to a new device:
ExportWallet.Step1: Connect both devices to the same WiFi network
ExportWallet.Step2: Open this app on your new device and select 'Restore Wallet'
ExportWallet.Step3: Enter your PIN on the new device
ExportWallet.Step4: Scan the QR code shown on this device
ExportWallet.WarningText: After successful transfer, your wallet data on this device will be ready for deletion.
ExportWallet.WaitingForConnection: Waiting for new device to connect...

ImportWallet.EnterPINTitle: Enter the PIN of the wallet you are restoring
ImportWallet.SubEnterPINTitle: Importing will overwrite any existing wallet. This action is
ImportWallet.ImportWalletScan: Please wait while we restore your wallet...
ImportWallet.ScanDescription: Scan the QR code displayed on your old device to restore your wallet.
ImportWallet.WalletRestored: Your wallet has been successfully restored!
ImportWallet.InvalidQRCode: Invalid QR code. Please scan the transfer QR code from your old device.

QRScanner.WeNeedYourPermissionToUseYourCamera: We need your permission to use your camera

Loading.TakingTooLong: This is taking longer than usual. You can return to home or continue waiting.

NameWallet.ThisIsTheName: This is the name people see when connecting with you.
NameWallet.CharCountDescription: You've exceeded the maximum character count of 50 characters. Please reduce your character count.
NameWallet.EmptyNameDescription: This is the name people see when connecting with you. Please enter a wallet name.

RenameContact.ThisContactName: This contact name is only displayed in your Contacts List.
RenameContact.CharCountDescription: You've exceeded the maximum character count of 50 characters. Please reduce your character count.
RenameContact.EmptyNameDescription: This is the name you will see for this Contact in your Contacts list. Please enter a contact name.

NetInfo.NoInternetConnectionMessage: You're unable to access services using Bifold or receive credentials until you're back online. Please check your internet connection.

Preface.Paragraph1: Most people will not have a need for Aries Bifold because very few digital credentials are currently available.
Preface.Confirmed: I have confirmed that this app is for me.

Verifier.ScanQR: Show this QR code to the other person to verify:

Verifier.TutorialStep1Title: Show this QR code to the other person
Verifier.TutorialStep1Description: You will connect with the other person. They will receive a proof request.

AppUpdate.Heading: Update Bifold to the latest version
AppUpdate.Body: Bifold was updated with new improvements. Update your app now to enjoy the latest features and enhancements.

Workflow.ActionFailedDescription: Something went wrong while processing this action.

Workflow.ResumeConfirmation: Are you sure you want to resume this workflow?
